title: Poor-Quality, Formulaic Papers Generated from Open-Access Health Data
summary: A Nature article reports on how five large open-access health databases are being exploited to generate thousands of low-quality, formulaic research papers, raising concerns about scientific integrity.

title: The Challenge of Paper Mills and Commercialized Scientific Misconduct
summary: An essay on the growing problem of 'paper mills' that mass-produce fraudulent scientific papers and the commercialization of academic misconduct.

title: Rex Reviews: A Curated News Digest for AI/ML
summary: The launch of a new, curated digest and link aggregator called Rex Reviews, providing the latest news in AI/ML, NLP, Computer Vision, and Causal Inference.

title: Official Google Gemini CLI Roadmap Published
summary: The official roadmap for the Google Gemini CLI has been released on GitHub, detailing guiding principles and key areas of future development.

title: Blog: Build Production-Ready GenAI with Temporal, Gemini, and Veo
summary: A technical blog post from Temporal demonstrating how to build robust, production-ready generative AI video applications using Temporal's workflow orchestration with Google's Gemini and Veo models.

title: ArXiv Paper: Dynamic Causal Effects in a Nonlinear World
summary: A research paper analyzing the challenges and nuances of determining dynamic causal effects in complex, nonlinear systems.

title: ICML Paper Presentation: "Deep Learning is Not So Mysterious or Different"
summary: A video overview of a paper presented at ICML 2025, arguing that the core principles of deep learning are analogous to established concepts in science and engineering.

title: Supervision Library v0.26.0 Release
summary: The `supervision` library for computer vision has released version 0.26.0, featuring support for VLM object detection, optimized annotators, and a documentation revamp.

title: Code: Production-Ready GenAI with Temporal and Gemini
summary: The companion GitHub repository containing the source code for the blog post on building production-ready video generation applications with Temporal and Google's AI models.

title: Talk: The Difficulty of Geo-Referencing Events Correctly
summary: A technical talk on the challenges of accurate event geo-referencing and a warning against using regressions with unverified GIS strategies.

title: Supervision Library Adds ViTPose and ViTPose++ Support
summary: As part of its v0.26.0 release, the `supervision` library now supports ViTPose and ViTPose++ pose estimation models from Hugging Face Transformers.
